thread.section_title: California Casualty Auto and Home Insurance Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of California Casualty Auto and Home Insurance | calcas.com | 4 of 27
thread.title: Michael Duminovich
thread.title_full: California Casualty Auto and Home Insurance reviewed by Michael Duminovich

author: Michael Duminovich
title: Michael Duminovich
text: California Casualty offers me reasonable rates, installment payment plan, and most of all, great coverage. The only claim I ever filed due to vandalism to my (previous) car, was handled quickly and efficiently, with little or no payment required on my end. When I switched from a previous auto insurance company, I immediately saved $800 a year! I wish I had signed on with CalCas earlier in my life! When I called in recently to have my policy re-evaluated, I saved even more. When I traded in a car/bought a new car, the transfer of my insurance was done quickly, and the necessary paperwork I needed was emailed to me until the hard copies arrived in the mail. Any agent I have ever spoken to was polite, friendly, and willing to assist me with my particular needs. Great company!
